thread.section_title: Hotel Mela - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Disappointed
thread.title_full: Disappointed - Review of Hotel Mela, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: outoford
title: Disappointed
text: My stay at Mela is the worst by far for any hotel I have been to. They checked me into a tiny room that I had to change the next day. But the worst part is having wifi that doesn't work for the entire 3 days I was there and having staff who seem least bothered by it! Which hotel in the world doesn't have working wifi!? I have had to resort to expensive data roaming. Would not recommend the hotel to anyone
